name: The North Face Chilkat II Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
categories: Chilkat II Nylon Waterproof Winter Boots
description: Waterproof boots that are tough enough for the mountains but made for the urban jungle. The North Face has evolved their popular Chilkat boot for harsh city winters.  Equipped with waterproof, ballistic nylon uppers and cold-proof rubber soles, they're ready for gnarly winter commutes.Waterproof, breathable DryVent™ technology seals out the elements.Light and efficient Heatseeker™ insulation stays warm even when wet.Partial rand adds protection where it's needed.Fleece lining in the collar seals out the cold while wicking away moisture.Large pull-on loops can be used while wearing gloves.Compression molded EVA midsole offers all- day support and excellent shock absorption.Winter Grip® rubber outsole has IcePick® temperature-sensitive rubber lugs, offering great traction in challenging winter conditions.
